NAME: R6Stats
AUTHOR: Tobotimus
SHORT: Get player stats for Rainbow Six: Siege
DESCRIPTION: Get general, fun, ranked, casual, per-operator or per-weapon stats for any R6: Siege player on any platform!
INSTALL_MSG:
Must be set up with an ubisoft account first. See `[p]r6auth` in PM.
Use `[p]r6stats` to get stats.
